property.name: Rules
property.value: {DARKNESS BLOCKER} When this creature loses a battle against a Darkness creature, this creature isn't destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {LIGHT BLOCKER} When this creature loses a battle against a Light creature, this creature isn't destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SURVIVOR} Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Survivor, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your manazone tapped) Double Breaker. Whenever one of your other creatures that has 'Dragon' in it's race attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battlezone that has power 5000 or less and put it into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker. Whenever one of your creatures is destroyed, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER}. Evolution - Put on one of your Survivors. Each of your creatures in the battle zone is a Survivor in addition to it's other races.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Giant Insects. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields). Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that has power 5000 or more breaks one more shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Humans. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields). While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each other fire creature in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields). When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an Armored Dragon from your deck, show that Armored Dragon to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Armored Dragons. Crew breaker-Armored Dragon (This creature breaks one more shield for each of your other Armored Dragons in the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your opponent's deck. Take up to 2 cards from his deck and put them into his graveyard. Then your opponent shuffles his deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Power Attacker +2000 When this creature would be destroyed, you may put a Earth Dragon and a Fire Bird from your mana zone into your graveyard. If you do, this creature stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put all water cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures can't be attacked by creatures that have the same civilization.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Cyber Viruses. When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: While you have at least one other Dragon in the battle zone, this creature gets 'Power attacker +6000' and 'Triple breaker'. Double breaker. This creature can't be attacked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of attacking, you may tap this creature to use another creature's {Tap} ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sympathy-Angel Command and Melt Warrior When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5500 or less and destroy them. Then, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross gears cost 1 less to cross with this creature. It can't cost less than 1. Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Feathernoid. Double breaker Accelerator: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, your other creatures get 'Speed attacker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Whenever this creature is blocked, destroy all of your opponent's creatures that have 'blocker'. Double breaker

card.name: Dark Jios, Lord of Dark Dragons

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero-If your opponent has 6 or more creatures in his graveyard, you may summon this creature for no cost. Whenever your Dragons attack, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Power attacker +4000 Triple breaker (This creature breaks 3 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear You can put an evolution creature of any race on the crossed creature. You can put an evolution cross gear of any civilization(s) on this cross gear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) This creature can't attack players. At the end of your turn, return this creature to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all of your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less. If you have at least one 'Dark Salamandaz, White Tiger Swordsman' in the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 4000 or less instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses a card in his hand and discards it. If you have a 'Helios Tiga Dragon' in the battle zone, your opponent discards all cards from his hand.
